channel.title: Cant log on to my own server and other people cant log into my server
channel.description: i cant log on to my own server and other people cant log into my server when i try to log in it says "no response from server try using a different world" im hosting with utorrent i need help

item.title: Cant log on to my own server and other people cant log into my server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

OGolemX:

i tryed utorrent too. theres a problem with utorrent. it takes the port instead of opening the port, so it does not allow users to join. thats why im on hamachi

What… What are you talking about.
The only time utorrent could potentially “block” a port, is if you happen to be torrenting. And even then it doesn’t.
You need to make sure utorrent is set up to go through windows firewall, though it usually is by default.
Also, running a server in utorrent is rather retarded.
This is how I used to do it (before I knew how to port forward):
Open utorrent.
Change port to 43595.
run server.
Change port to 43594.
Close server.
Run server.

Though, I’d rather port forward (read sig)

Read full topic
item.source: Cant log on to my own server and other people cant log into my server

item.title: Cant log on to my own server and other people cant log into my server
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

OGolemX you’re wrong. You can use utorrent to open the port you want but i recommend trying to portforward through your router.

OT: make sure your port is open by going to this site: http://www.yougetsignal.com/tools/open-ports/

Read full topic
